headline: Buffett's Berkshire Buys Shares of Domino's Pizza and Pool Corp., Dumps Apple Stock
summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway took stakes in Domino's Pizza and swimming pool supplier Pool Corp. in the third quarter while continuing to trim stakes in longtime holdings Apple and Bank of America.

headline: Buffett’s Berkshire Buys Stakes in Domino’s and Pool Corp.
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Berkshire Hathaway Inc. bought stock in Domino’s Pizza Inc. and Pool Corp. during the third quarter as Chairman Warren Buffett cut back on some long-held investments. Shares of the two new holdings jumped in late New York trading.Most Read from BloombergUnder Trump, Prepare for New US Transportation PrioritiesZimbabwe City of 700,000 at Risk of Running Dry by Year-EndSaudi Neom Gets $3 Billion Loan Guarantee From Italy Export Credit Agency SaceThe Urban-Rural Divide Over Highway E

headline: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Takes a Small Stake in Domino’s Pizza
summary: The Omaha, Neb., company also disclosed a new position in Pool Corp. and cut its stake in Capital One.

raw.headline: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Takes a Small Stake in Domino’s Pizza
raw.summary: The Omaha, Neb., company also disclosed a new position in Pool Corp. and cut its stake in Capital One.

headline: Berkshire bites into Domino's Pizza, dips into Pool amid stock retreat
summary: (Reuters) -Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway said on Thursday it made new investments in Domino's Pizza and Pool Corp in the third quarter, even as it retrenched from stocks such as Apple and Bank of America.  Berkshire owned 1.28 million Domino's shares worth about $549 million as of Sept. 30.  It also owned 404,000 shares of Pool, a distributor of swimming pool supplies, worth about $152 million as of that date.

headline: Tracking Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Portfolio - Q3 2024 Update
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's Q3 2024 13F portfolio changes included new stakes in Domino's Pizza and Pool Corp, and reductions in AAPL and BAC stocks. Read more here.
